_header: Cross of Jesu Christ be ever our speed
_description: ‘þe ABC of deuocion’ — four stanzas rhyme royal

BodRawB408.First Lines:
[Cross] (a picture) Of ihesu criste be euer oure spedeAnd kepe vs
                    from perel of synnes and payne…
BodRawB408.Last Lines:
…Titulle of þi passion Poynt us saueAs to thy [cross]
                    reuerence we may haue
BodRawB408.Attributed Title: Here begynneth þe A.B.C. of deuocion (f. 3)
